metadata.Title: CVE-2013-5572 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Zabbix 2.0.5 allows remote authenticated users to discover the LDAP bind password by leveraging management-console access and reading the ldap_bind_password value in the HTML source code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-5572` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

zabbix-agent - 1:2.2.2+dfsg-1
zabbix-frontend-php - 1:2.2.2+dfsg-1
zabbix-java-gateway - 1:2.2.2+dfsg-1
zabbix-proxy-mysql - 1:2.2.2+dfsg-1
zabbix-proxy-pgsql - 1:2.2.2+dfsg-1
zabbix-proxy-sqlite3 - 1:2.2.2+dfsg-1
zabbix-server-mysql - 1:2.2.2+dfsg-1
zabbix-server-pgsql - 1:2.2.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Chema Alonso, Pablo González, Germán Sánchez

notes.Note: seth-arnold> may require an authenticated user to carry out attack on another user, perhaps with different privileges

criterions.comment: zabbix package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.2.2+dfsg-1').
